Getting Black Hat on my Android

August 21, 2014

Today I decided to try something new. This project was actually quite tedious. I wanted to get Black Hat on my Android. It took a lot of adjustments. There were times when I thought that the two would not be compatible with each other, but at last I got them both working together.
